reviews.text: The staff and management are the worst I have ever experienced as well as the condition of the room! I've stayed in many places and I will never stay here again! The bedding, carpet, and furniture were unclean and stained. There were holes in the walls and the bathroom looked like it hadn't been cleaned in months. Also the room had a horrible dirty body odor that was over-powering. You have to wonder what the management is allowing to occur in their rooms. It seems like the type of place that would rent rooms by the hour. Not worth the $100 per night. Any other, lower-priced, motel would be better.
reviews.title: horrible, horrible, horrible!

reviews.text: If you are looking for a cheap place to lay your head at night, this place is OK. However, they don't maintain the hotel very well. It was not swimming season, but I'd think that they still would not want the pool water to be discolored. It was green. There was parts of the Bathroom wall that were warped and looked like cottage cheese under the paint. It looked like they did maintenance to just be good enough for human habitation, not to make the place look good at all. The beds were comfortable enough and there was a safe in the room as well as a refrigerator and microwave.
reviews.title: Run down, not maintained very well

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 4 nights and it was fine. The bed was clean and comfy. Our room was quiet and clean. It is not a 4 star hotel and not priced as one either. I would stay again.
reviews.title: Was just fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Recent price increase makes it not worth the trouble.

reviews.text: This hotel recently raised their prices by $10-$15 per night. No longer worth the trouble, stay at another hotel down the street for less money (and faster Internet). I don't expect much from a $40 a night room, but at $55 I expect just a bit more than this.
reviews.title: Pass on this motel.

reviews.text: upon arrival we found that the pool had no water in it and was only able to connect to the internet 1 time. i will never stay at a travelodge again. this was a dream vacation to spring training for the San Francisco Giants and i've never been more disappointed in my life. i think our money should be refunded but its my guess that this survey wont even get read.
reviews.title: disappointed
BEDBUGS do not stay here
reviews.text: Stayed in room 116 and found a bedbug after becoming itchy from bites. This is the worst place I have ever stayed, no phone book ,pen , paper or clock. Toilet seat loose and falling off, shower did not work, no face cloths in room, towels badly stained and dirty. Breakfast was a very few donuts and coffee but only 2 tables and 4 chairs. Walls thin and noisy. They made a receipt on check out on the computer when I requested it but all they had in their file was the hand written one I filled out on checkin. I had presented my Wynham rewards card at checkin but it is not recorded on my receipt. The window in the back of room faces a fence which had a foot square hole cut in it so someone could look in if the blinds were not closed. What a dump!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked in thro Expedia, the place is terrible! The kitchenette floor was sticky, the window was broken and covered with brown paper. Someone had punched a hole in the bathroom door (unit 111). I would definitely NOT recommend this place.Snowbirds please stay away from this place!
reviews.title: What a dump!

reviews.text: we checked in and got in our room the back door had no locks, the tv had no buttons to switch channels or volume along with no remote. the room was discustingly dirty to where we had to switch rooms. we get the room right next door and in the fridge was a dead cockroach. the shower still had the remainder of the last persons hygiene still in it. the drapes looked like they haven't been dusted in years. this is something i won't be doing again.
reviews.title: Horrible hotel!

reviews.text: the rooms need alot more tlc trash behind dresser and under the bed we found a pillow case with trash and beer cans under the bed.
reviews.title: not very clean

reviews.text: The place was inexpensive like $30/night. It was ok for the price. If you are wanting a $100 hotel service and room this is not the place for you. If you need a cheep room that is Fairly clean, a hot shower and a prepackaged pastry and coffee in the morning this place may work for you. The comforter was old and had a cigarette burn in it but the room's ac worked well as did the shower and other fixtures. There is a lot of foot traffic in the parking lot as there is a bus stop right there. The owners/workers were none too friendly but were adaquate. This is acctually the second time i stayed here so it must be ok.
reviews.title: Good for the Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed at this hotel 3 times in the last 4 months. It's getting worse! For some reason, I was not able to get the King-size bed that I reserved this time (the language barrier kept me from understanding exactly why). It looked to me as if none of their rooms with a king-size bed were in use (I think one wing of the hotel was totally shut down). There was no apology, no discount, just two double-beds instead of one king. The priceless thing they said was "no extra charge"! I had to laugh...
reviews.title: Getting Worse

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom tiles look like they were recently laid by a rank amateur: crooked lines, thick edge-grout, etc. The shower hardware was white with lime, everthing leaked, and the shower water pressure was quite low. I realize this is in a desert where there's been a persistent drought, but really.
reviews.title: SOOO dirty.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The advertised free wireless internet was so slow as to be absolutely useless.
reviews.title: Dirty and run-down; you can do much better for the money
